emuInput.TitMainTitle: Horace Henderson and Lena Horne holding sheet music in Stanley Theatre, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, Louisiana edition, December 9, 1944, pg. 13, reads: "Looking It Over - That's what luscious Lena Horne, glamorous stage and screen star, and Horace Henderson, famed arranger and conductor, are doing prior to a recording session in Hollywood [image taken in Pittsburgh].  In addition to her waxing date, Lena is slated to make two pictures and is set for another public appearance tour of the Nation's theatres. - Harris Photo."
